examples.patterns.strategy

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • examples.patterns.strategy.Player

  • class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    A Player class that get's constructed with a concrete implementation of an IWeaponStrategy and IArmourStrategy to show how the 'Strategy Pattern' works.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Player(IWeaponStrategy weapon, IArmourStrategy armour)
      2 arg constructor

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IArmourStrategy getArmour()
      Returns the IArmourStrategy the Player is currently using.
      IWeaponStrategy getWeapon()
      Returns the IWeaponStrategy the Player is currently using.
      void output()
      Prints the current attack and defence of the player.
      void setArmour(IArmourStrategy armour)
      Gives the Player a new IArmourStrategy.
      void setWeapon(IWeaponStrategy weapon)
      Gives the Player a new IWeaponStrategy.
